project_plan.name: Random Password Generator
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement password generation logic with configurable length
Include uppercase letters in the password generation
Include lowercase letters in the password generation
Include numbers in the password generation
Include special characters in the password generation
Write tests to verify that the password generator works correctly
Execute tests on the password generator to ensure functionality and randomness
